title: Hey, looking for embossed sans serif, seventies-ish vintage.
content:
Here it is as the title for a Miles Davis album.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324002802im_/http:/typophile.com/files/milessmiles_5984.jpg)
 and here, used recently in a shirt design. 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150324002802im_/http:/typophile.com/files/suljazz_5216.jpg)
i know i have seen the typeface used recently too, but am completely stuck as to the name. Thanks :)
author: mcmillions
